metadata.description: Community marketplace for Claude Code plugins

plugins.name: angular-developer
plugins.description: Comprehensive Angular development plugin for Claude Code supporting Angular 19+ features including Signals, zoneless change detection, standalone components, Angular Material, Vitest testing, and Storybook. Pure frontend focus with browser development.

plugins.name: flutter-developer
plugins.description: Comprehensive Flutter development plugin for Claude Code - supports desktop (Windows, macOS, Linux) and mobile (iOS, Android) development with Firebase, Supabase, and all major state management solutions

plugins.name: rust-api-developer
plugins.description: Comprehensive Rust API development plugin for Claude Code - supports REST (Axum) and gRPC (Tonic) with OpenTelemetry observability, structured logging, and Cloud Run deployment

plugins.name: rust-lib-developer
plugins.description: Claude plugin for Rust library development targeting cross-platform use (Flutter, WASM, Java, Go, .NET, Electron) with performance focus, no_std support, and OpenTelemetry/defmt observability.
